message.content:
Subject: Resignation from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. After careful consideration, I have made the difficult decision to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day will be [insert date].

It has been a pleasure working with such an incredible team and contributing to the success of our company. I am grateful for the opportunities and experiences that I have gained during my time here.

I would like to express my appreciation for your support, guidance, and mentorship throughout my tenure. Your leadership has not only helped me grow professionally but also personally.

In order to ensure a smooth transition, I am willing to assist in finding and training my replacement or providing any necessary documentation. Please let me know how I can best support the team during this time.

Thank you again for the opportunity to be a part of [Company Name]. I wish the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
